sourcing.instructions: CaO: Chemical suppliers or online marketplaces (e.g., Sigma-Aldrich); Ga2O3: Specialty chemical suppliers; Pr2O3: Rare earth material suppliers; Tm2O3: Rare earth material suppliers.
steps: CaO: Chemical suppliers or online marketplaces (e.g., Sigma-Aldrich); Ga2O3: Specialty chemical suppliers; Pr2O3: Rare earth material suppliers; Tm2O3: Rare earth material suppliers.
1. Weigh all ingredients accurately using a digital balance.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Weigh all ingredients accurately using a digital balance.

steps: 1. Turn off the furnace and allow it to cool to room temperature naturally (approx. 6-8 hours).
cooling.raw_text: 1. Turn off the furnace and allow it to cool to room temperature naturally (approx. 6-8 hours).

steps: 1. Remove the solid sample from the crucible carefully.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Remove the solid sample from the crucible carefully.
